Week 9 : Lesson 1 : Routes and Layouts

==========================================

Review

Review from Week 8 : Lesson 5 : Active Record & Databases. One (or more) pair will rehash the previous session's lesson by teaching the basic learnings to the group. They will explain it to the others by drawing a diagram, using an analogy, telling a story or in some other way creatively communicating the idea without using code.
